price: 48. Marka lagu yidhaahdo: Rukuuca ma ay rukuucaan6.
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ
footnotes: 6. Marka lagu yidhaahdo u hoggaansama Amarka Ilaahay uma hoggaansamaan, sidoo kale waxaa lagu fasiray marka lagu yidhaahdo tukada ma ay tukadaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu ir'kaʿū lā yarkaʿūna
